News.headline: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 27th January
News.page_title: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 27th January
News.URL_keywords: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 27th January
News.short_description: After Monday's postponement the Chigwell Construction Stadium will once again be hosting West Ham's U23 Premier League 2 fixture this coming Friday, the 27th January when they face Aston Villa
News.description:
West Ham United’s under-23 side are back in action this Friday at the Chigwell Construction Stadium when they host Aston Villa at 7pm in a Premier League 2 Division two game. The Hammers are currently fifth in the table but would leapfrog Wolves, Newcastle and Fulham into second place with a victory.

The two sides met in October at the Banks’s Stadium, Walsall with The Villans winning 2-0 and preventing The Hammers from topping the table.

New signing Nathan Holland is likely to be included in the West Ham side.

West Ham United U23 last Five Results:
Away v Brighton L0-3
Home v Norwich W2-1
Away v Wolves W4-0
Home v Swansea L2-3
Home v Brighton L1-3

Admission to all Hammers U23 games at the Chigwell Construction Stadium is free for West Ham Season Ticket holders with admission costing everyone else £5 for adults and £3 for concessions. The Clubhouse is also open to all supporters before and after the game.
 
The postponed fixture on Monday against Leicester City in the Premier League Cup has now been rescheduled for Thursday, 9th February, 7pm kick off.
